title: Bad loan restructuring emerges to be a better option for ARCs
description: In FY24, asset reconstruction companies saw a shift towards prioritising loan restructuring over asset sales, focusing on value maximisation and revival potential. This strategic change reflects the evolving role of ARCs in the resolution of bad loans, as they adapt to new credit loss provisioning standards and offer more flexible repayment options.
